Initializer# init(_:access:onSelect:label:fallback:parameters:)

DeviceDiscoveryUISwiftUIiOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init<Provider>(
    _ browserProvider: Provider,
    access: DDDevicePairingAccess = .default,
    onSelect: @escaping (Provider.Endpoint) -> Void,
    @ViewBuilder label: () -> Label,
    @ViewBuilder fallback: () -> Fallback,
    parameters: (() -> NWParameters)? = nil
) where Provider : BrowserProvider
```
